metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19432 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in libsndfile 1.0.28. There is a NULL pointerdereference in the function sf_write_int in sndfile.c, which will lead to adenial of service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19432` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsndfile1 - 1.0.28-4ubuntu0.18.04.1
sndfile-programs - 1.0.28-4ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsndfile package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.28-4ubuntu0.18.04.1').
